featured.text: Its worldwide popularity is mainly due to its theme music, which showcases ABBA’s timeless songs in a fresh and vital way 24 retains the essence of both pop music and good musical theater.

the sweet smell from the bakery, so I walked in and bought a fresh loaf of bread.

other.text: The potato chips have been left uncovered on the table for such a long time that they no longer taste fresh and _____.
Despite the economic and environmental hurdles, desalination is becoming increasingly attractive as human beings are using up fresh water from other sources.
24 fresh onions, they have multiple layers of thick, dark, papery skin.
They found that during the dry season about half of the snakes accepted fresh water offered to them, while nearly none did during the wet season.
Pets are wonderful, B.…with the freshest ingredients.
To turn seawater into fresh water, we need to remove the salt in seawater, that is, to desalinate seawater.
They usually live near the coastal area where there is more fresh water.
If a sea snake was dried and weak, it drank more fresh water.

As the world population continues to grow, shortages of fresh water will occur more often and the need for additional water supplies will become critical.
With its delicate taste, the fresh onion is an ideal choice for salads and other lightly-cooked dishes.
To make fresh lemonade, cut the lemon in half, _____ the juice into a bowl, and then add as much water and sugar as you like. (A) decrease (B) squeeze (C) freeze (D) cease 12.
Because yellow-bellied sea snakes usually spend all of their time far from land, rain is the animals’ only source of fresh water.
The increasing population in Saudi Arabia has resulted in shortages of fresh water.
Fresh onions are available 21 yellow, red and white throughout their season, March through August.
When it rains, a thin layer of fresh water forms on top of the ocean, providing the snakes with a fleeting opportunity to lap up that precious resource.
But fresh water can be in short supply in many arid regions of the world such as Saudi Arabia, where there are limited water resources.

definition.zh_def: 新鮮的；未經加工或處理的。
definition.en_def: Recently made or obtained; not stale or spoiled.
definition.example: I bought some fresh vegetables from the market.
